WRITING.TITLE: Who here stays away from reviews before seeing a movie?
WRITING.TEXT: I used to always be one to check a movies rotten tomatoes score, or my favorite critic's reviews before seeing a film, but I've found that when doing so, It can alter my expectations for a film before seeing it. So now I stay away, but I have seen films that I normally wouldn't have watched if not for the positive reception they received. So, what are your views on this subject?
